job.title: Equipment Maintenance and Repair Technician
job.description:
If you are a Equipment Maintenance and Repair Technician with experience, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
We are in the midst of successful financial and operational growth. Over the past several years we have expanded market share, reduced its operating cost through strategic initiatives, and it has done so while maintaining positive revenues. Moreover, we continue to strengthen our competitive position in the market by introducing innovative solutions that meet the high-quality standards of upstream oil and gas customers at a value competitors cannot match.
What You Will Be Doing
Equipment Maintenance and Repair Technician is responsible for the Preventive Maintenance and Repair of company assets (products, equipment and inventory) within an assigned region. The EMRT ensures all assets and inventory are kept in good operational condition to support safe, successful and high-quality services to our customers.
What You Need for this Position
What's In It for You
You will have the use of a company truck and paid travel when required.
So, if you are a Equipment Maintenance and Repair Technician with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Ashley.Upchurch@CyberCoders.com
Ashley Upchurch - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
